project.name: Helios Datalake
project.scope: Unified ELT to Snowflake, dbt modeling, Kafka ingestion

sections.title: Project Context and Objectives
sections.goal: Understand the overarching goals of Helios Datalake, its customer impact, and how it aligns with Novereon's mission and values.
sample_questions: Can you describe the current phase of Helios Datalake and its primary objectives?
How does the project align with the 'Safety First' and 'Customer-Obsessed' values?
What are the main customer pain points this initiative aims to address?

sections.title: Technical Architecture and Data Flows
sections.goal: Explore the technical underpinnings of the Helios Datalake, including ELT pipelines, dbt modeling, and Kafka ingestion patterns.
sample_questions: Could you walk me through the end-to-end data flow from ingestion to modeling?
What role does Kafka play in ensuring data timeliness and reliability?
Have there been any notable changes since RFC-1287 on partitioning strategy?

sections.title: Operational Runbooks and SLAs
sections.goal: Examine operational readiness, failover procedures, and SLA commitments.
sample_questions: How is RB-ING-042 applied during ingestion failures?
What are the key metrics tracked to meet SLA-HEL-01's 99.9% availability?
Can you share an example of a recent incident and how it was resolved?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify and analyze dependencies between Helios Datalake and other Novereon projects.
sample_questions: Are there integration points with the Nimbus Observability project for monitoring?
How does data from Borealis ETL feed into the Helios Datalake?
What are the coordination challenges with Quasar Billing for usage metering?

sections.title: Product Roadmap and Prioritization
sections.goal: Understand how features are prioritized, balancing customer needs, technical debt, and risk.
sample_questions: How do you decide which enhancements to tackle in the next quarter?
What trade-offs have you made between speed of delivery and data quality?
Can you describe a situation where you had to deprioritize a highly requested feature?

sections.title: Risks, Tradeoffs, and Future Decisions
sections.goal: Discuss upcoming strategic decisions, associated risks, and evidence-based reasoning.
sample_questions: What are the biggest risks facing Helios Datalake in the next 12 months?
How do you evaluate whether to scale horizontally or vertically for ingestion workloads?
Can you reference any recent audits or runbook revisions that influenced these decisions?
